function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unrequired self-isolation due to self-positives","Impact":"Isolation can lead to mental health issues and lack of productivity","Mitigation":"Ensuring proper testing and verification measures are in place","Technologies":"AI-based testing and monitoring apps","People":"Public with access to testing","Owner":"Government and healthcare authorities"},{"Description":"Risk of spreading virus by visiting hospitals","Impact":"Increase in virus transmission and overload of healthcare facilities","Mitigation":"Promotion of telemedicine services and use of telecommunication apps","Technologies":"Telemedicine apps, chatbots, and remote monitoring tools","People":"Patients and healthcare professionals","Owner":"Government and healthcare providers"},{"Description":"Use of contact tracing apps for monitoring COVID-19 cases","Impact":"Collection of personal data and potential privacy concerns","Mitigation":"Ensuring data encryption and user consent for data collection","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps and data encryption software","People":"General public using the apps","Owner":"Government and developers"}]}
